review: I have been consulting Dr. Khetan since my child was 7 days old. He is 5.6 years old now and any health issue he had till now. Always Doctor have given best treatment and guidance. Even when we were out of town and my son got 102 + fever and consulted online. He diagionized the issue and gave apt medicien… Appreciate all he does for kids. ** ** *** ** *** **** ******** Thanks a lot Doctor Khetan
